description:
Numberlink is a puzzle where you connect the same numbers without crossing lines.
Trust your instinct and get connecting! Keep in mind that the longer the distance, the harder it gets.

The options menu, manual, and other text are available in Japanese, English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.
name: Puzzle by Nikoli S Numberlink
intro: Intuitive puzzle where you draw lines to connect the same numbers.
